TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Tab/TopTabItem extends System.Object
public: ref class VisualStyleElement::Tab::TopTabItem abstract sealed

summary.span: 針對與其他索引標籤控制項 (Tab Control) 共用下、左和右框線的索引標籤控制項，就它的每個狀態提供 物件。

span.span: Provides objects for each state of a tab control that shares its bottom, left, and right borders with other tab controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每一個屬性的類別會傳回共用其下方的索引標籤控制項的不同狀態，如左和右框線與其他索引標籤控制項。Each property of the class returns a for a different state of a tab control that shares its bottom, left, and right borders with other tab controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立與傳回屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a with the returned by the property. 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. 處理表單的事件和呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElementTabTopTabItem1`方法從事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為。Handle the form’s event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementTabTopTabItem1` method from the event-handling method, passing `e` as . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#122](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#122)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#122](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#122)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Disabled As VisualStyleElement

span.span: Gets a visual style element that represents a disabled tab control that shares its bottom, left, and right borders with other tab controls.

value.span: ，表示停用的索引標籤控制項 (與其他索引標籤控制項共用下、左和右框線)。

span.span: A that represents a disabled tab control that shares its bottom, left, and right borders with other tab controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用傳回屬性以建立。You can use the returned by the property to create a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立與傳回屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to create a with the returned by the property. 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. 處理表單的事件和呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElementTabTopTabItem4`方法從事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為。Handle the form’s event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementTabTopTabItem4` method from the event-handling method, passing `e` as .
